  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orderable, NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor

    public class RepostNoteStoringPreProcessor
extends Object
implements NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
    Processor for reposts.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String KEY_ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS
      Key for holding the attachment IDs of the original note that should be reposted.
      static String KEY_ORIGIN_AUTHOR_ID
      Key for the ID of author of the note that was reposted.
      static String KEY_ORIGIN_NOTE_ID
      Key for the ID of the note that was reposted.
      static String ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS_SEPARATOR
      Separator that is used to join the attachment IDs to store them in the property KEY_ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS.

      • KEY_ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS

        public static final String KEY_ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS
        Key for holding the attachment IDs of the original note that should be reposted. This property will only be set for autosaves.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS_SEPARATOR

        public static final String ORIGIN_ATTACHMENT_IDS_SEPARATOR

        See Also:

        public boolean isProcessAutosave()
        Specified by:
        isProcessAutosave in interface NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
        Returns:
        whether the PreProcessor should also be called when doing an autosave. This is normally not required.

      • process

        public NoteStoringTO process(NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO)
                      throws NoteStoringPreProcessorException,
                             NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Invokes the processor before the note is stored.
        Specified by:
        process in interface NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
        Parameters:
        noteStoringTO - The note to work on.
        Returns:
        The altered NoteStoringTO.
        Throws:
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException - thrown to indicate that the pre-processing failed and the note cannot be created
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - thrown to indicate that the note cannot be created because of access restrictions

      • processEdit

        public NoteStoringTO processEdit(Note noteToEdit,
                                 NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO)
                          throws NoteStoringPreProcessorException,
                                 NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
        Processing function which is invoked before an existing note is updated.
        Specified by:
        processEdit in interface NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor
        Parameters:
        noteToEdit - the note which should be edited. Implementors should not modify the note.
        noteStoringTO - transfer object holding the data for updating the note
        Returns:
        The altered NoteStoringTO.
        Throws:
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException - thrown to indicate that the pre-processing failed and the note cannot be created
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - thrown to indicate that the note cannot be created because of access restrictions
